name: Super Catch'Dem Munsters
description:
Made for 'so bad it's good' Jam. I had a lot of fun making it, it's just awful. Use the arrow keys to move, escape to open the menu and go back and space to enter. There are no bug, only extra features.

This is Super CatchDem Munsters, the hit new game by that game company your children love so much. Now featuring almost a dozen monsters to catch and battle.

Staring fan favorite hero of Super Like-to-Jump Friends, Pink! Catch your fvaorite old Muns like Buzzbuzz, Clowno, and Turtle. The best selling games and favorite among everyone's grandchildren.
